name: haskell-devcontainer
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y libgmp-dev && curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://get-ghcup.haskell.org | BOOTSTRAP_HASKELL_NONINTERACTIVE=1 BOOTSTRAP_HASKELL_ADJUST_BASHRC=1 sh && export PATH="$HOME/.ghcup/bin:$PATH" && ghcup install ghc && ghcup install cabal
